snippet: Excerpts from an interview with Jihad Makdissi, a former Foreign Ministry spokesman in Syria who fled in 2012 as the government cracked down on protesters.
lead_paragraph: Excerpts from an interview with Jihad Makdissi, a former Foreign Ministry spokesman in Syria who fled in 2012 as the government cracked down on protesters.

headline.main: In Syria, Former Official Says, ‘Nobody Is Winning’
headline.print_headline: In Syria, Former Official Says, ‘Nobody Is Winning’
